fullplot: Twenty 12-year-old black boys from one of the most violent ghettos in Baltimore, Maryland, are taken 10,000 miles away to an experimental boarding school in rural Kenya, to try to take advantage of the educational opportunities they can't get in their own country.
plot: Twenty 12-year-old black boys from one of the most violent ghettos in Baltimore, Maryland, are taken 10,000 miles away to an experimental boarding school in rural Kenya, to try to take ...
title: The Boys of Baraka

tomatoes.consensus: The interviewed boys are compelling subjects, but the documentary would be better if the filmmakers had provided more factual details.
